https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/38iS2MMIfv2zoBiRF8eNWqIHl3H.jpg Based on the Ayyat train accident that killed 361 in 2002, this ensemble drama delves into the intense human stories of the passengers in a third-class coach car during the hour and a half before the crash. An Hour and a Half
